# [Pure Fade](https://github.com/arg0NNY/BetterAnimationsPacks/tree/main/pureFade) ![Status][status-official-badge] ![Version][purefade-version-badge]
A collection of transparency switch animations from BetterAnimations with a true fade transition â€” eliminating the slight flicker of the background at the cost of lacking support for transparent Discord themes.
